mapper.select: select concepts.ui, string_info.name from Concepts concepts inner join Atom_Clusters atom_clusters on concepts.id = atom_clusters.id inner join Atoms atoms on atom_clusters.default_pref_atom_id = atoms.id inner join String_Info string_info on atoms.string_info_id = string_info.id where concepts.ui = #{cui}

select c.ui, c.id, rs.abbreviation, si.name from Concepts c, Atom_Clusters ac, Atoms a, root_sources rs, string_info si where c.id = a.concept_id and a.id = ac.default_pref_atom_id and a.string_info_id = si.id and c.id = ac.id and c.id = #{id} and rs.abbreviation = #{sab}
select c.UI as UI, c.ROOT_SOURCE as ROOTSOURCE, s.NAME as STRING from Codes c inner join Atoms a on c.id = a.code_id inner join String_Info s on a.string_info_id = s.id order by c.ui
